text: Karin Peckert-Forsman (born 24 February 1905, date of death unknown) was an Estonian alpine skier. She competed in the women's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. She was the first woman to represent Estonia at the Olympics. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Sportspeople from Tallinn Category:People from the Governorate of Estonia Category:Baltic-German people Category:Estonian female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Estonia Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics
title: Karin Peckert-Forsman
